rows.label: tlk00340106_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, Boss! Are you taking on missions
for the Merc Group?

rows.label: tlk00340106_msg0002
rows.name:
The more missions you complete, the
more you'll be trusted with the bigger
ones!

rows.label: tlk00340106_msg0003
rows.name:
Just remember to drop by from time
to time, yeah?
